RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsCodecId.summary: The codecId property of the dictionary is a string that uniquely identifies the object that was inspected to produce the data in the for the {{Glossary("RTP")}} stream.

remarks.para: RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStats and RTCCodecStats objects are correlated by iterating the to find the statistics objects where RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStats.codecId is equal to .

RTCRemoteInboundRtpStreamStatsCodecId.value: A string that contains the of the object that was inspected to produce the object associated with this RTP stream.
